slice.configuration.title: Slice
slice.configuration.category.display.too: Options for the visual aspect of the menu.
slice.configuration.category.display.siz: Options for adjusting the size of UI elements
slice.configuration.display.size.radialM: Radius of the radial menu in pixels, i.e., the distance from the center of the screen
slice.configuration.display.size.itemSiz: Size of each item slot in the radial menu.
slice.configuration.display.size.slotSiz: Size of the slot background texture.
slice.configuration.display.visibility.b: How much of the background color is visible when the menu is open.
slice.configuration.display.visibility.h: When enabled, empty slots in the radial menu will be hidden
When enabled, removes the slot number from the radial menu
When enabled, no slot sprite will be displayed
slice.configuration.category.display.vis: Options to disable specific slots from displaying in the menu.
slice.configuration.display.visibility.d: When enabled, slot number 1 won't be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot number 2 won't be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot number 3 won't be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot number 4 won't be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot number 5 won't be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot number 6 won't be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot number 7 won't be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot number 8 won't be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot number 9 won't be displayed in the menu.
slice.configuration.display.maxAngle.too: The start angle from which the menu starts drawing. If the same as End Angle, the menu will go a full 360 degrees.
slice.configuration.display.endAngle.too: The end angle at which the menu stops drawing. If the same as Start Angle, the menu will go a full 360 degrees.
slice.configuration.display.counterclock: When enabled, the radial menu reverses its order. (9th slot -> 1st slot)
slice.configuration.category.behaviour.t: Options for changing how the mod behaves gameplay-wise
slice.configuration.behaviour.toggleKeyb: When enabled, pressing the "Open menu" key will toggle the menu. (No need to keep holding the key)
slice.configuration.behaviour.clickToSel: When enabled, to switch to a desired slot, you'll need to click on the slot, not just release the button.
slice.configuration.behaviour.closeOnSel: When enabled, selecting a slot will close the menu if you have "Click to Select" enabled.
slice.configuration.behaviour.innerDeadz: Extends the selectable area inward from the menu radius. Increase to require moving the mouse further from the center before slots can be selected.
slice.configuration.behaviour.outerDeadz: Extends the selectable area outward from the menu radius. Increase to require keeping the mouse closer to the menu for slot selection.
